person_say: I'm struggling with some difficult study material and feeling frustrated. What can I do to overcome it?
animal_say: Do you want some tips for managing your study time, or would you like to find a way to relax and clear your mind first? I'm here to help you choose the best path!

person_say: I would like some tips for managing my study time. That sounds really helpful!
animal_say: You should meet my friend Bizy, the bee! She's a time management wizard and can help you overcome procrastination while studying!

person_say: Meeting Bizy the bee sounds wonderful! I would love to get some time management tips from her!
animal_say: Buzz buzz! Here comes Bizy! She's all set to share some magical time management tips to help you with your studies!
